name: poenskelisten
description: Poenskelisten is a simple self-hosted wishlist app for organizing and sharing gift ideas with others. It includes sorting, sharing links, and a minimal UI for personal use.

features.title: Wishlist Creation
features.description: Create and manage personal wishlists for gifts and desired items

features.title: Item Details
features.description: Add product names, descriptions, links, and prices to wishlist items

features.title: Sharing Links
features.description: Generate shareable links to let others view your wishlist

features.title: Priority Sorting
features.description: Mark items with priority levels to indicate most wanted gifts

features.title: Claim Tracking
features.description: Allow others to mark items as claimed to avoid duplicate gifts

features.title: Multiple Lists
features.description: Create separate wishlists for different occasions or categories

features.title: User Accounts
features.description: Manage individual accounts for family members with separate wishlists

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Set wishlists as public or private to control visibility
